item.title: CHKLC has announced the winners of the 2014 HK Corporate Governance Excellence Awards
item.description: The Chamber of Hong Kong Listed Companies (CHKLC) recently revealed the winners of the Hong Kong Corporate Governance Excellence Awards 2014. The CHKLC defines corporate governance as respecting shareholder rights and values, maintaining board and management integrity, and demonstrating transparency and accountability. Dr. Eddy Fong, Judging Panel Chairman, highlighted that the awardees went beyond standard practices, tailoring their governance strategies to address industry-specific risks and challenges. “Furthermore,” he stated, “winning companies view sustainability as inseparable from good corporate governance, crucial for long-term growth.
